45.eng-name: The Book of Oaths (qasamah), Retaliation and Blood Money

hadiths.text: It was narrated that Abu Rimthah said; "I came to the Prophet with my father and he said:'Who is this with you?' He said:' my son, I bear witness (that he is my son). He said: 'You cannot be affected by his sin or he by yours

chapter.ara-name: باب هَلْ يُؤْخَذُ أَحَدٌ بِجَرِيرَةِ غَيْرِهِ
chapter.eng-name: Can Anyone Be Blamed For The sin Of Another?
